recommendations: Naba Medhi ‚ÄúHarshit did a great job during his internship with ABInBev. He had worked with me for a good number of RPA projects on the OTC and Customer Service domain. The role included end-to-end process understandings, creating business requirement documents, and BOT development with Automation Anywhere. I am impressed by his proactiveness and ownership and the way he has handled all the challenges to deliver the desired results. I am sure Harshit will achieve great things in his career.‚Äù

honors_and_awards.title: Hult Prize- Kuala Lumpur Regional Finals
honors_and_awards.description: - Conceptualised a solution to solve the problem of unemployment using an innovative product based solution using Rice husk. - Secured the 1st Position at the campus round held at IIT Kharagpur amongst 50+ participating teams. - Selected by the Hult Prize by Clinton Foundation to represent IIT Kharagpur at the Kuala Lumpur Regional Finals.
